Introduction

Ruka is a Japanese trainee under YX LABELS. He placed fourth on the reality survival show Oen-High, making him a member of the debut lineup of the upcoming boy group aoen. He is a former member of the pre-debut boy group 24kumi. He was also a contestant on the reality survival show iCON Z ~Dreams For Children~.
